event.name: LogFileClosed
event.comment: The Buffer Logger closed a log file

event.name: LogFileOpenError
event.comment: The Buffer Logger encountered an error opening a log file

arg.name: errornum
arg.comment: The error number returned from the open operation

event.name: LogFileValidationError
event.format_string: Failed creating validation file %s with status %d
event.comment: The Buffer Logger encountered an error writing a validation file

event.name: LogFileWriteError
event.format_string: Error %d while writing %d of %d bytes to %s
event.comment: The Buffer Logger encountered an error writing to a log file

arg.name: errornum
arg.comment: The error number returned from the write operation

arg.name: bytesWritten
arg.comment: The number of bytes successfully written

event.name: NonVolatileReadError
event.comment: The Buffer Logger failed to read the non-volatile logging state from the disk

event.name: NonVolatileWriteError
event.comment: The Buffer Logger failed to write the non-volatile logging state to the disk

event.name: SetState
event.comment: The volatile logging state of the Buffer Logger changed
